Today in County Clare, it's looking great with 4 ft @9s W swell and light 8 mph WNW winds. Lahinch Beach and Lahinch Left are prime spots, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @8s W with fresh 13 mph S winds, making for a bit of chop but still some fun waves at sheltered spots. By the day after, expect a significant jump to 10 ft @14s W, with S winds at 11 mph, lighting up multiple breaks including Lahinch and Doolin Point. Best: today.
